nodes.text: The Varvva system was a star system located in the Barsa sector of the galaxy's Mid Rim and New Territories that was home to the sentient Varvvan species. A hyperlane connected the system to the Bars Barka and Iridonia systems, and it fell within the borders of the New Republic in 12 ABY.
The Varvva system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square J-6.
